John lived to be very old.  He witnessed the destruction of Jerusalem and the ruin of the stately temple.  The last survivor of the disciples who had been intimately 
                                                                           172
connected with the Saviour, his message had great influence in setting forth the fact that Jesus was the Messiah, the Redeemer of the world.  No one could doubt his sincerity, and through his teachings many were continually turning from unbelief.
